name: Concussion VR
description:
This game has not been tested for photosensitive epilepsy, play at your own risk.

The game starts when you open it. There is a gun in your left hand. Aim with the grip, shoot with the trigger. They will come from above. Protect your brain. Hit yourself in the face to reload (you'll hear the click). Take too many hits to the face and the concussion will take over.

ESC to exit.
